verses.verse: Let us <WG5399> therefore <WG3767> fear <WG5399>, lest <WG3379>, a promise <WG1860> being left <WG2641> us of entering <WG1525> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, any <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> should seem <WG1380> to come short of it <WG5302>.

Again <WG3825>, he limiteth <WG3724> a certain <WG5100> day <WG2250>, saying <WG3004> in <WG1722> David <WG1138>, To day <WG4594>, after <WG3326> so long <WG5118> a time <WG5550>; as <WG2531> it is said <WG2046>, To day <WG4594> if <WG1437> ye will hear <WG191> his <WG846> voice <WG5456>, harden <WG4645> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> Jesus <WG2424> had given <WG2664> them <WG846> rest <WG2664>, then would he <WG302> not <WG3756> afterward <WG3326> <WG5023> have spoken <WG2980> of <WG4012> another <WG243> day <WG2250>. Jesus: that is, Joshua
There remaineth <WG620> therefore <WG686> a rest <WG4520> to the people <WG2992> of God <WG2316>. rest: or, keeping of a sabbath

For <WG1063> he that is entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, he <WG846> also <WG2532> hath ceased <WG2664> from <WG575> his own <WG846> works <WG2041>, as <WG5618> God <WG2316> did from <WG575> his <WG2398>.

For <WG1063> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> is quick <WG2198>, and <WG2532> powerful <WG1756>, and <WG2532> sharper <WG5114> than <WG5228> any <WG3956> twoedged <WG1366> sword <WG3162>, piercing <WG1338> even to <WG891> the dividing asunder <WG3311> of soul <WG5590> and <WG5037> <WG2532> spirit <WG4151>, and <WG5037> <WG2532> of the joints <WG719> and <WG2532> marrow <WG3452>, and <WG2532> is a discerner <WG2924> of the thoughts <WG1761> and <WG2532> intents <WG1771> of the heart <WG2588>.
